config.js: js/thirdparty/jquery.js js/thirdparty/doubletaptogo.js js/app.js js/app/display.js js/app/viewport-size.js js/app/nav.js js/app/show-and-hide.js js/app/sticky-scroll.js js/app/date-picker.js js/app/table-of-contents.js js/app/language-toggle.js js/app/mobile-filters.js js/app/equal-height.js js/app/print-page.js js/app/hover-state.js js/app/scroll.js js/app/loading-screen.js

scripts.build-css: mkdir -pv dist/css && ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style compressed scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css && ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style compressed scss/pdf.scss dist/css/pdf.css
scripts.build-ie-9-css: mkdir -pv dist/css && ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style compressed scss/main.scss dist/css/ie-9.css && ./node_modules/bless/bin/blessc dist/css/ie-9.css -f
scripts.build-old-ie-css: mkdir -pv dist/css && ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style compressed scss/old-ie.scss dist/css/old-ie.css && ./node_modules/bless/bin/blessc dist/css/old-ie.css -f
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-old-ie-css && npm run build-ie-9-css && npm run build-js
scripts.dev: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js & npm run server
